content: It’s time for Democrats to grow a fucking spine. They rolled over on health care (by not even presenting a public option and that’s just for starters) too. There are myriad other examples but I’m too incensed to recall them. Stop taking the high road whenever conservatives exhort you to. Which is usually the moment right after Republicans spent years fucking things up for the 99% on the low road. Quit being Charlie Brown to the right’s Lucy.
